content:
by  Grant TilleryPublished  March  

Though the Black Keys new track Fever was the biggest single splash of yesterday equally as phenomenal is Chance the Rapper  the Social Experiments his touring band surprise dropHome Studio Back Up In This Bitch. its raw unmixed and naught for structure there are five bar verses and unassuming phrase starting points which feel purposeful instead of haphazard and arguably features Chance at his finest. his delivery is delightfully exasperated as if Chance was victorious in a marathon panting his thoughtout rhymes. the beat makes the listener yen for the lush horn orchestrations and bottom heavy funk of jazzfusion great Donald Byrd and the prominent organesque synthesizer is the love child between the Stax Records vault and the ethereally chill Washed Out. no James Blake Chances current roommate influences are evident here Home Studio is pure ungelded Chance who gave us the  Day mixtape PERIOD
